meanings: [명사] request, demand, call; (비용을) claim, [동사] request, demand, call for, ask, call (up)on

vlive.korean: 다른 거 몬베베 요청 없었어? Is there another request? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 기오브
우리 미리 우즈에게 요청을 드렸죠? We asked you ahead of time, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : [full] WOODZ 1ST MINI ALBUM [EQUAL] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: We asked you ahead of time, right?

vlive.korean: "지효, 미나에게 솔로 V LIVE를 해달라고 요청할 수 있습니까?" "JIHYO, can you tell MINA that I want her solo V LIVE"? 듣기 View video TWICE : 입사 15주년🎂
vlive.english: "JIHYO, can you tell MINA that I want her solo V LIVE"?

vlive.korean: [앵콜 요청] 워우! [Requests an encore] Wow! 듣기 View video NU'EST : L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.21 뉴이스트의 진실 혹은 거짓 (Truth Or Dare)
[도움 요청] 형 이거 묶을 줄 알아요? [Asking for help] Do you know how to tie this? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] "고오급 TMI 티키타카" (한결, 도현 : H&D)
vlive.english: [Asking for help] Do you know how to tie this?

examples.korean: the solicitation of money for election funds 발음듣기 선거 자금을 위한 금전 요청 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the solicitation of money for election funds 발음

examples.korean: Only genuine refugees can apply for asylum. 발음듣기 진짜 난민인 사람들만이 망명을 요청할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Only genuine refugees can apply for asylum. 발음

examples.korean: her obstinate refusal to comply with their request 발음듣기 그들의 요청에 응하지 않으려는 그녀의 고집 센 거부 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: her obstinate refusal to comply with their request 발음

examples.korean: We were overwhelmed by requests for information. 발음듣기 우리는 정보 요청들이 밀려와서 어쩔 줄을 몰랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were overwhelmed by requests for information. 발음

examples.korean: Historians and critics are solicited for their opinions. 발음듣기 역사학자들과 비평가들이 의견(을 내달라는) 요청을 받고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Historians and critics are solicited for their opinions. 발음
